subject: Sports Injuries
Basketball
lead_paragraph: While a direct line cannot be drawn between the Knicks’ ages and injuries, the two issues sit side by side as the season begins, leaving the team’s fans more than a bit uneasy.
snippet: While a direct line cannot be drawn between the Knicks’ ages and injuries, the two issues sit side by side as the season begins, leaving the team’s fans more than a bit uneasy.
